DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open-label , multinational study design evaluate `` standard '' regimen , PegIntron 1.5 µg/kg subcutaneously weekly plus ribavirin 800-1200 mg daily [ Arm PEG2b 1.5/R ( 24 week ) ] , compare low dose regimen , PegIntron 1.0 µg/kg subcutaneously weekly plus ribavirin 800-1200 mg daily [ Arm PEG2b 1.0/R ( 24 week ) ] , use 24 week treatment duration arm . Additionally , study examine efficacy reduce treatment duration : PegIntron 1.5 µg/kg subcutaneously weekly plus ribavirin 800-1200 mg 16 week [ Arm PEG2b 1.5/R ( 16 week ) ] .
